Articles.Content:
After some searches, I havenÃ‚Â´t found yet the purpose of this icon. Any help or guide? IÃ‚Â´ve found guides for the navball, editor and other huds, but not for the main screen hud at all.

Edited December 27, 2014 by ilo
already answered
I think that just shows you when you have completed a contract and also the rewards you get from it.
It shows you when you've completed a contract in Career mode. As far as I know it has no purpose in Sandbox or Science unless there are other messages which use it (which I may have missed ).

Ok, thanks for your assistance!!!

Might want to edit the post and change the Title so it says "Answered."

In stock as far as I know the only use for that is contracts information, but there are several mods out there that use it for other purposes; for example StageRecovery uses it to let you know when (and how badly) your stages land.
